entry.def: Self-examination is thought that you give to your own character and actions, for example in order to judge whether you have been behaving in a way that is acceptable to your own set of values.

example.ex: The events in Los Angeles have sparked a new national self-examination...
example.tran: 发生在洛杉矶的事件再次引发了全国范围的反思。

example.ex: Once you've picked a company that seems right for you, you have to make sure you're right for it. This is a time for some more self-examination.
example.tran: 一旦你选择了一家看起来适合自己的公司，你一定要确认自己也适合它。这时需要更多的自省。

entry.def: Self-examination is the act of examining your own body to check whether or not you have any signs of a particular disease or illness.

example.ex: Breast self-examination is invaluable for detecting cancer in its very early stages.
example.tran: 乳房自检对早期癌症的发现是极为重要的。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
